name: XWUI Multi Select Component
description: Multi-select dropdown component for selecting multiple options. Wraps XWUISelect with multiple selection mode enabled. Displays selected options as tags/chips with optional max tag count and custom tag rendering. Uses XWUISelect and XWUIChip internally.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

maxTagCount.description: Maximum number of tags to display before showing '+N' indicator

tagRender.description: Custom function to render tags (not serializable in JSON)

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the multi-select

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component
